If you skip this step you will not be ab: If you skip this step you will not be able to share or stream media outside your home. If you change your mind later, you can adjust this in Settings.
If you would like to enable this now, yo: If you would like to enable this now, you will need to configure your router or firewall to allow Plex to contact your server. Please refer to our {1}Connecting a Server{2} article for more information.

Enable this if automatic mapping fails. You will need to configure your router. Detailed instructions are available {1}here{2}.

Sets the allowed networks setting to 127: Sets the allowed networks setting to 127.0.0.1/255.255.255.255. This requires other computers on a local network to authenticate before accessing the server.

Allow searching libraries that have been: Allow searching libraries that have been shared with you.
Allow searching channels that have enabl: Allow searching channels that have enabled search.
Use the experimental video player, which: Use the experimental video player, which supports streaming to the HTML5 video element instead of the Flash player. Requires Plex Media Server 0.9.8.6 or later.
Allows the player to play compatible med: Allows the player to play compatible media without any conversion. In most browsers, direct play supports MP4 videos with h264 video and AAC audio. Videos with subtitles cannot be played directly.
Allows the server to copy compatible aud: Allows the server to copy compatible audio and video streams without converting them.
When multiple resolutions are available: When multiple resolutions are available for a video, automatically use the best resolution below the maximum quality.
Allow Direct Play of AC3 Audio: Allow Direct Play of AC3 Audio
Allow MP4 videos with AC3 audio to be pl: Allow MP4 videos with AC3 audio to be played directly. Browser support for AC3 audio is limited.
Prefer AAC Audio: صدای AAC را ترجیح می دهم
Prefer AAC over MP3 when transcoding aud: Prefer AAC over MP3 when transcoding audio. Some devices, like the Wii U, only support HLS with AAC audio.
Cinema Trailers to Play Before Movies: Cinema Trailers to Play Before Movies
Let's start by giving your Plex Media Se: Let's start by giving your Plex Media Server a friendly name so it can identify itself to other computers on the network. If you leave it blank, your computer name will be used.
Would you like to help us make Plex bett: آیا می خواهید برای کمک به بهتر شدن پلکس برای همه ما را یاری کنید؟ ما در حال جمع آوری داده های ناشناسی هستیم، که  به منظور بهبود خدمات در طول زمان استفاده می شود.
Plex channels give you access to online: کانال های پلکس به شما در دسترسی به رسانه ها از سایت های متنوع یاری می کند. شما می توانید این کانال ها را در فهرست کانال ها جستجو و نصب کنید.اما با نصب برخی از کانال های ویژه آغاز کنید.
See, that wasn't too bad, right? At this: See, that wasn't too bad, right? At this very moment, Plex is working tirelessly to build your library, and make it look beautiful.
Feel free to watch Plex work, or take th: Feel free to watch Plex work, or take this opportunity to {1}download{2} some Plex apps!
We really appreciate it. See what {1}ben: We really appreciate it. See what {1}benefits{2} come with your subscription.

Sign in with a Plex account to help your: Sign in with a Plex account to help your devices find each other, access your media from anywhere, and queue up videos from your browser to watch later in Plex.
Plex organizes your media into libraries: Plex organizes your media into libraries. You can add as many libraries as you want, and you can have multiple libraries with the same type.

You can also recommend the video to frie: You can also recommend the video to friends or “fling” it to a Plex player and watch it there.

Capability checking ensures that plug-in: Capability checking ensures that plug-ins that are incompatible with this version of the server or the current client application you are using are hidden. Disabling capability checking is useful during development, but will enable access to plug-ins that may perform unreliably with certain client applications.

Media Link does not support DTS audio in: Media Link does not support DTS audio in certain regions. The Plex Media Server can automatically convert DTS to stereo so that it will play.
